review: i think its fine my personal least favorite out of the 3 major faction dlc my tier list is split vendettakingdoms endcradle adds a cool little storyline with the xenon that comes with consequences expands gate network
terrible optimisation
probably the best dlc for x4 adds a completely new economy system instead of a different one and has a lot of new cool content
must have dlc best addition to the game since release
essential content
my favorite dlc i love the terran ships and their unique economy makes it easy too build their stations their ships etc
dlc brings best startscenario for beginners and i love terrans
fighting for earth and sol is my favorite hobby yes from the duck  their simplified economy is also nice for newbies
very nice dlc terran engines  shields alone are worth it
the strongest and prettiest ships in the game
amazing
great dlc my favorite faction and region
terran cadet  best start for the new players
very good for new players terrans have a decent gamestart and a simplified economy

probably the least complicated dlc out of them all it brings a very simple economy system to the base game along with the new sectors new factions new ships best shields best pulse weapon systems and the largest battleship in the game i would say this dlc would be a good first or second play through start for anyone but i believe the devs geared the start towards newer players since the economy is not very complicated and the starting systems are pretty peaceful
a required dlc to expand the base game adds excellent set of ships and a cool new economy type along with having funrewarding missions to do
great for the price adds a lot of ships
adds terrans and yaki to the game with two of the best player ships imo
good dlc expands the sandbox adds new factions ships equipment mechanics story is also one of the better ones
a must have dlc for x4
racist humans and the best looking ships plus a massive battleship
id go as far to say that this dlc is mandatory for getting the most enjoyment out of the game

this focuses on the terran faction and the sol system of earth a main part of the x4 story at least for humanity while nothing really stands out everything is pretty much straight forward and not too complicated locations and storyline would appeal to newer x4 players

definitely well worth it  terran ships stations space is really cool  some epic space battles as part of the questlines too  i personally prefer building my empire with the rings of saturn and mars as background space etc  plus the terran economy is a bit simple and easier to navigate   i was a big fan of x3 and have really loved x4 foundations its even better  first couple years were rocky but the devs have patched up and improved the game so much its just fantastic now
the torus aeternal segment 34 quest puzzle is the biggest middle finger that was pointed at me in gaming ever didnt expect this from a game dev and not a player  x4 is great but this broke me
added the expansive sol system along with a few other systems many ships and a new story start thats not bad if youre a new player just be wary the commute to and around sol can take a while
terran ships sectors and missions are great introduced variable sunlight mechanic which would be great to see implemented accross the universe
xenos cant stand this
great addition
earth
my favourite addon the terran ships and stations are absolutely breathtaking
the terrans print me money so that i can buy the galaxy
definitely the best of the dlcs theres a large variety of ships and an interesting story line
not as many sectors a the last dlc but adds an entirely new economy to coexist with  the yaki and terrans make a return pretty satisfying to play

amazing excluding one tiny detail i dont believe they actually tested to see how the ai handles docking with the enclosed terran port as i constantly see ai ramming into it and eventually using magical powers to phase through and dock
love the story the ships setting and soundtrack best expansion
i really did not use to like this x when compared to tc and ap however this single dlc has propelled this game to be my favorite x game so far this dlc is 100 worth the purchase and experience

i bought it at full price and i dont regret it new ships new economy system new weapons and finally we have a battleship not an aircraft carrier an actual battleship  the campaigns are good one of them probably is the best introductory campaign for newbies  and last but not least the new territories nothing like conquering the solar sytem 100 recommended
this dlc makes great addition to the game must have

my second favorite expansion behind the split coh brings the most content and the most rewarding story missions the terran ships and stations are beautiful and their simplified economy is a much softer place to learn the game by design they do not mesh well with the rest of the universe which leads to a disjointed feel when starting as one still a must buy if you enjoy the series
my oh my the ships look good
very enjoyable expansion
all i can say playing this dlc its good to be back with all that makes the terrans great with cool ships and xenophobia  that said ditch the kukri and buy a katana asap

enhances the x4 experience a lot more sectors and awesome looking ships the most important part is the new terran cadet start finally a worthy introduction storyline  if you like x4 this one is an easy buy
fxxking awesome
i have yet to be disappointed with x4s dlc im looking forward to the games continual growth the new ships stations and sectors add a lot of interesting diversity to the universe
more x4 at a higher quality than the base game i dig it
its the terran fleet again what more reason do you need for this major faction from x3 terran conflict to rejoin your game

great expansion especially tuned to new players to play with 3 products  plenty of cool missions and an amazing campaign that affects your whole game depending what path you choose which allows for multiple starts to play differently
accidentally caused the solar system to be overrun by a group of very angry robots 1010 would underestimate the gravity of my decisions again

overall i like x4 even with the bugs this new coh dlc was a miss for me and i just started went back to the old start in argon i loved the idea of going to sol and all that it may bring but it void of activity and very difficult to get started in the system as opposed to the basic game
exactly what x4 needed this is a great addition with new features and also some important storylines that breathe some life into a universe that was very mechanical at first
really enjoying it so far love the new storyline and shipsstations   some issues with docking and autopilot to terran stations
x4 just keeps getting better back to sol great shots of all our familiar planets mars looks amazing
finally good story line quest  very deep  with difficulty increased step by step  interesting quest locations  npc design is very interesting
if you are playing x4 this dlc is a must
the new ship and station models are superb and the story is pretty good too theres some interesting new gameplay twists and some branching storyline in there the best dlc so far
great addition to x4  game keeps getting better and better

one of the best dlcs egosoft ever made it has beautiful new systems stations ships music and plenty of amazing plots with multiple endings thank you egosoft i love that you add more plots for all skill progression levels from just starting out to endgame terraforming content with proper rewards cant wait to see your next dlc you are going on the right path with this
just learnt to play from the rugged gamers beginers guide  this game turns out to be amazing
the terran stations and ships are the best yet  more missions more ships and stations  another must have if you like x

a bigger universe to play in a whole new set of ships to play with and investigate and finally a new set of plots and station modules set in the solar system of earth all win no downside   a very solid expansion and very satisfactory to get into if youre a new player highly recommended  oh and a very solid set of fixes and improvements for the base game even with the expansion out of the equation
the storyline for this expansion is a big step up from previous storylines for x4 keep it up egosoft
awesome sauce
very good

egosoft  has done a fantastic job making a good game even better a true successor to x3 cradle of humanity has added many more ships story lines and systems to explore this game is well supported and has a good selection of mods in steam workshop
terran stuff is back still no planetary landing but a lot of new content and endgame things to do best expansion so far

this dlc adds the terran factions to the game egosoft continues to complete this game one step at a time in my opinion they barely have scratched the possibilities of what they can do with x4 i hope they continue to add more content and activities to grow an empire in this game

without this dlc you dont combine this x4 game in your mind with our real universe all solar system comes with teladi and other corporations story and combats are really amazing with better graphics and mechanics   this game highly needs these expansion dlcs i feel the future again in this dlc as in before x series  i see few small bugs but no worries they keep updating x4 i like their customer based vision they listen your ideas comments in forums  they fix bugs afap

nvidia rtx 3080 here never cashed even once yet a lot of small problemnothing game breaking like when i explore a the boundary of a sector as map expands star gate icon on map  drifts to a wrong location i guess its because map ratio changed i need to close and reopen map to update gate location

the most fun ive had in the x universe in years  this game has come so far  egosoft just does not get enough credit for what a small group of dedicated people can accomplish   this dlc has storylines  it has terrans  it has yaki    dont forget your friendly youtubers and all the tips they provide  this game is not hard but it is deep
solid dlc decent  short campaign and beautiful ships
a much needed addition to the base game great work
purge the xenons for terra  1010 dlc starting terran ship is better than the other starting ships ive used marignily and has an actual campagin with people i give a shit about
best story so far terran economy is more miner based and less trade ship

despite initially giving this expansion a negative review due to it having a rough initial release im happy to say that the developers fixed the majority of the issues quickly and i am very much enjoying the return of the terrans to the x universe the new story line is highly enjoyable and well fleshed out and the ship designs are beautiful in my opinion this is the best expansion so far

the new ships are excellent the new systems and the whole new economy are good to have and i like having the new conflicts too also the story missions for the terrans are all right worth getting if you enjoy the base game

this dlc is well worth the money   it adds new terran ships and stations and interesting sectors   the main terran plot missionsstoryline is of a higher quality when compared to the base game and the split dlc story   the soundtrack that accompanies this dlc is amazing
awesome dlc
more please

egosoft have been upping their game and it shows highly recommended for fans of the x series plot line so far reminds me of some of my favorite moments in x3 tc new expansion ships and stations are cool free updates are nice as usual  go go egosoft
nice dlc
so far its awesome seeing the old x3 style stations and ships is great game before this didnt really grab me but so far the campaign hooks have me good
human ships are gorgeous
with both dlcs split vendeta  cradle of humanty the best x i ever played great
a brilliant expansion to the x4 universe the terran ships and sectors are gorgeous and the new terran plots also add a great twist to the usual plot progression

coh expansion adds much to the game with beautiful ships and astounishing new sectors and also nicely done plots and of course the majestic terrans  x4 is becoming the definitive x experience amongst all the releases
sweet dlc thank u for more content
holy spacepope terran stuff looks great

an awesome expansion for x4 best one so far  this expansion has more plot and lore than the last split expansion about the same number of new ships maybe a few more but less new sectors but the sol system is added

man this game is something special  all the pieces are fitting together nicely with the humans involved now   boron will rise  so much more to come  there is nothing like this game  one of a kind masterpiece

this expansion is a new level regarding mission design its fun to play immersive and giving a the feeling of being a small nobody in a big universe the new ships and stations are beautiful this dlc is even better than the first one
the terran faction ships are awesome and its cool to see earth
you have x4 what are you waiting  but seriously i dont think youll buy this because i know all of you guys already bought the season pass
